sentences.sContent: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.sCn: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

sentences.sContent: ...the report’s writers downplay that potential outcome in that it has not yet occurred...
...And the fact that they have a personal stake in the outcome makes them really pay attention...

trans.tranOther: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens
